systemData.Description: Azure Resource Manager metadata containing createdBy and modifiedBy information.

exclude.Description: Exclude the resource from Advisor evaluations. Valid values: False (default) or True.

lowCpuThreshold.Description: Minimum percentage threshold for Advisor low CPU utilization evaluation. Valid only for subscriptions. Valid values: 5 (default), 10, 15 or 20.

duration.Description: Minimum duration for Advisor low CPU utilization evaluation. Valid only for subscriptions. Valid values: 7 (default), 14, 21, 30, 60 or 90.

digests.Description: Advisor digest configuration. Valid only for subscriptions

name.Description: Name of digest configuration. Value is case-insensitive and must be unique within a subscription.

actionGroupResourceId.Description: Action group resource id used by digest.

frequency.Description: Frequency that digest will be triggered, in days. Value must be between 7 and 30 days inclusive.

categories.Description: Categories to send digest for. If categories are not provided, then digest will be sent for all categories.

language.Description: Language for digest content body. Value must be ISO 639-1 code for one of Azure portal supported languages. Otherwise, it will be converted into one. Default value is English (en).

createdBy.Description: The identity that created the resource.

createdByType.Description: The type of identity that created the resource.

lastModifiedBy.Description: The identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedByType.Description: The type of identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedAt.Description: The timestamp of resource last modification (UTC)

systemData.Description: Azure Resource Manager metadata containing createdBy and modifiedBy information.

ttl.Description: The duration for which the suppression is valid.

expirationTimeStamp.Description: Gets or sets the expiration time stamp.

systemData.Description: Azure Resource Manager metadata containing createdBy and modifiedBy information.

impact.Description: The business impact of the recommendation.

impactedField.Description: The resource type identified by Advisor.

lastUpdated.Description: The most recent time that Advisor checked the validity of the recommendation.

risk.Description: The potential risk of not implementing the recommendation.

suppressionIds.Description: The list of snoozed and dismissed rules for the recommendation.

resourceMetadata.Description: Metadata of resource that was assessed

learnMoreLink.Description: The link to learn more about recommendation and generation logic.

potentialBenefits.Description: The potential benefit of implementing recommendation.

actions.Description: The list of recommended actions to implement recommendation.

remediation.Description: The automated way to apply recommendation.

exposedMetadataProperties.Description: The recommendation metadata properties exposed to customer to provide additional information.

problem.Description: The issue or opportunity identified by the recommendation and proposed solution.

solution.Description: The issue or opportunity identified by the recommendation and proposed solution.

resourceId.Description: Azure resource Id of the assessed resource

source.Description: Source from which recommendation is generated

singular.Description: The singular user friendly name of resource type. eg: virtual machine

plural.Description: The plural user friendly name of resource type. eg: virtual machines

systemData.Description: Azure Resource Manager metadata containing createdBy and modifiedBy information.

lastRefreshedScore.Description: The details of latest available score.

consumptionUnits.Description: The consumption units for the score.

potentialScoreIncrease.Description: The potential percentage increase in overall score at subscription level once all recommendations in this scope are implemented.

aggregationLevel.Description: The aggregation level of the score.
